wellcomeml.io.epmc package

Submodules

wellcomeml.io.epmc.client module

Client library for the EPMC REST API.

class wellcomeml.io.epmc.client.EPMCClient(api_endpoint='https://www.ebi.ac.uk/europepmc/webservices/rest', max_retries=60, log_level=20)

Bases: object

EPMC_URL = 'https://www.ebi.ac.uk/europepmc/webservices/rest'
get_citations(session, pub_id, source='MED')

Fetches citations from EPMC’s REST API for a given publication pub_id and source (e.g. ‘MED’)

get_full_text(session, pmid)

Fetches full text from EPMC’s REST API for a given pmid.

get_references(session, pub_id, source='MED')

Fetches references from EPMC’s REST API for a given publication pub_id and source (e.g. ‘MED’)

requests_session(adapter_kwargs=None)

Returns a requests session with retry params in place, and configured for a single persistent connection (since we generally expect one session per thread).

search(session, query, result_type='core', page_size=10, only_first=True, **kwargs)

Fetches metadata from EPMC’s REST API for a query.
